mapper.select: SELECT `attr_id`, `attr_name`, `search_type`, `icon`, `value_select`, `attr_type`, `enable`, `show_desc`, `catelog_id`, `value_type` FROM `pms_attr` WHERE `attr_id` IN (SELECT attr_id FROM pms_attr_attrgroup_relation WHERE attr_group_id = #{attrGroupId})

SELECT pa.attr_id, pa.attr_name, pa.search_type, pa.icon, pa.value_select, pa.attr_type, pa.`enable`, pa.catelog_id, pa.show_desc, pa.value_type, pag.attr_group_name, pc.`name` AS catelog_name FROM pms_attr pa LEFT JOIN pms_category pc ON pa.catelog_id = pc.cat_id LEFT JOIN pms_attr_attrgroup_relation paar ON pa.attr_id = paar.attr_id LEFT JOIN pms_attr_group pag ON paar.attr_group_id = pag.attr_group_id WHERE pa.catelog_id = #{catelogId} AND attr_type = #{attrType} AND (CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{key}) > 0 THEN (pa.attr_id = #{key} OR pa.attr_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%')) ELSE TRUE END)

SELECT pa.attr_id, pa.attr_name, pa.search_type, pa.icon, pa.value_select, pa.attr_type, pa.`enable`, pa.catelog_id, pa.show_desc, pa.value_type, paar.attr_group_id FROM pms_attr pa LEFT JOIN pms_attr_attrgroup_relation paar ON pa.attr_id = paar.attr_id WHERE pa.attr_id = #{attrId}
